attributes.action: that every new dwelling shall be associated with the planting of a new tree of a significant size.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given that England was once covered in forests, it should come as no surprise that the environmental balance is changing.
Loss of trees during developments are a result of profit margins and nothing else. Sadly, most trees are lost by council developments where their own rules about tree preservation orders can be ignored.
The government should be seen to seed the creative efforts required to place new trees around new developments.
